NCS - Attendance Update
Dear {!Contact.Name} and Parent/Guardian,
We hope you have really enjoyed your time on NCS. Before the graduation ceremony, we wanted to let you know that, based on our records of your attendance, you have missed too much of the NCS programme to become an official NCS graduate. Unfortunately, this means you won’t be able to receive your certificate.
However, you are both still very welcome to come along to the graduation ceremony to celebrate your achievements on NCS with your teammates. The graduation ceremony will be on {!Wave__c.Graduation_Date__c} - you should have received an invitation with full details in the post but please contact us if you haven’t.
If you have any questions or need to get in touch with us about this, you can call us on 0203 542 2400. Please do not reply directly to the email address we’ve sent this from as we cannot check replies to this mailbox. You can contact us by email at contact@ncsthechallenge.org.
We hope to see you at the graduation ceremony.
Yours sincerely,
Rachel Slade Head of Programmes and Staffing
